title: IT Job Recruitment
passages: Document 1: Job Opening: Cloud Systems Architect at Nexus Tech. Responsibilities: Design and maintain AWS-based infrastructure, optimize Python scripts for automation, and lead security audits. Requirements: Minimum 5 years of experience in cloud computing. Certification in AWS Solutions Architect is preferred.

Document 2: Email From Sophia Rossi (July 15). Subject: Application for Cloud Systems Architect. To: Hiring Team, Nexus Tech. I am writing to express my interest in the position. I have 6 years of experience in backend development using Python and have spent the last 3 years specializing in AWS migrations. While I do not currently hold the specific certification mentioned, I am scheduled to take the exam next month.

Document 3: Internal HR Note (July 18). Candidate: Sophia Rossi. Status: Initial Screen Passed. Note: Strong Python background. Although she lacks the AWS certificate, her 6 years of total experience meets our minimum requirement. Let's schedule a technical interview for the week of July 25. Ask her about her experience with 'security audits' during the talk.

questions.q: What is one task the Cloud Systems Architect will perform?
questions.explanation: 文書1のResponsibilitiesにoptimize Python scripts（Pythonスクリプトの最適化）が含まれています。

questions.q: What is true about Ms. Rossi's qualifications?
options: She has exactly 5 years of experience.
She is already a certified AWS Architect.
She has more than the minimum required experience.
questions.explanation: 要件は5年（文書1）ですが、彼女は6年の経験がある（文書2）ため、最低要件を満たしています。

questions.q: When will the technical interview likely take place?
questions.explanation: 文書3でthe week of July 25（7月25日の週）に面接を予定するとあります。

questions.q: What will the interviewers specifically ask Ms. Rossi about?
questions.explanation: 文書3の最後にAsk her about her experience with 'security audits'と指示があります。
